status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
as per the document method, open_append_stream will create the file if does not exists. But when I try to append to the file in hdfs it is throwing an error like file, not found.
